page.title: 09 RESIDENTIAL
page.content: Sark has many buildings,some of which have been standing for years.Most of the houses are built from stone,wood or asbestos. To build a house on Sark you need permission from the landowner,then the Amenities Committee decides whether or not you can build.One of the most important things that you have to prove is that you have lived on Sark for fifteen years.Also your house must not be seen from the road or sea and it must not be over 30ft high. Some buildings are two storeys high and are usually owned by retired English people who enjoy the peace and quiet of the Island or by locals who let out part as self-contained flats to summer visitors.
